title: Using TrainerDay Cycling Training Plans in TrainerRoad

transcript.full_text: hello this is alex from trainer day and i'm going to show you how to load our plans and the workouts from our plans into trainer road so prior to this video you should have cloned a plan which is basically making a private version of the plan for yourself and you will be on this page you can find other instructions on the site on how to do that in other videos on how to do that and you come in here and you click download you select your file type you could set your week which isn't relevant for this video but anyway we'll just go ahead and set our week to next week and we click download we now get a zip file right here which is in my downloads folder i'll go ahead and open that now i've got a bunch of MRC workouts here and for trainer road you need to search google and find something called trainer road workout creator and i will open that workout creator here it is here I could show you just trainer Road workout create or I spelt it wrong workout creator so you can see here workout creator sure there's a download here somewhere download download the trainer Road workout grater here anyway so now that I've got workout creator open here what I can do is I can just drag workouts in here so I'll start with the first day you got to drag it right over here and I erase this I changed the name like this it has week 1 day 1 in it so and then you have the workout here and you just click publish and so you just continue to do that for each workout just takes a minute or so and then the next time you open trainer Road you can go into your custom workouts and you will see all of these workouts in there and can just follow them so you follow them more like a sequence of workouts I believe in trainer wrote in the newer versions you can actually just drag these items then onto a calendar if you wanted it into their calendar and that would be it thank you very much
